title: Royal Enfield Shotgun 650 launched in India: Price, specs, features
description: Royal Enfield recently launched the Shotgun 650 in the Indian market at a starting price of Rs 3.59 lakh (ex-showroom). The company has already commenced bookings for the Royal Enfield Shotgun 650 at its official website or authorized dealerships across the country. ​​The custom-inspired motorcycle, Royal Enfield Shotgun 650 is available in four colour options, namely Stencil White, Plasma Blue, Green Drill, and Sheetmetal Grey.
